member.name: T:Authentication.Service.IEmployeesRepository
member.summary: Interface for interacting with employee data repository.

member.name: M:Authentication.Service.IEmployeesRepository.GetEmployeesDetailsAsync
member.summary: Retrieves details of all employees asynchronously.
member.returns: An asynchronous operation returning a collection of Employee objects.

member.name: M:Authentication.Service.IEmployeesRepository.GetEmployeeDetailsAsync(System.Int32)
member.summary: Retrieves details of a specific employee asynchronously.
member.param: The unique identifier of the employee.
member.returns: An asynchronous operation returning the Employee object if found, otherwise null.

member.name: M:Authentication.Service.IEmployeesRepository.AddEmployeeAsync(Authentication.Model.Employee)
member.summary: Adds a new employee asynchronously.
member.param: The Employee object representing the employee to be added.
member.returns: An asynchronous operation returning the added Employee object.

member.name: M:Authentication.Service.IEmployeesRepository.UpdateEmployeeAsync(System.Int32,System.Int16)
member.summary: Updates vacation hours for a specific employee asynchronously.
member.param: The unique identifier of the employee.
The new value of vacation hours.
member.returns: An asynchronous operation returning the updated Employee object.

member.name: M:Authentication.Service.IEmployeesRepository.DeleteEmployeeAsync(System.Int32)
member.summary: Deletes a specific employee asynchronously.
member.param: The unique identifier of the employee to be deleted.
member.returns: An asynchronous operation returning the deleted Employee object.
